Jul 19, 2015

A Home for my Long-form Rambling

tags: hello

For quite some time, my friends have been nagging me to put together a blog.

Blame this site on them.

I’ve been sharing code and tips in random Github gists for several years via tweets and online chats.

I’ll probably keep doing that.

But now if it’s interesting enough to write about but I can’t fit it into 140 characters, it’ll probably end up here.

And if it doesn’t - now I have no excuse to avoid blogging about it when you nag me.

Happy now?

Michael Lynn hangs out at @mikeymikey
